acqinfo.p: This group of Thomas Jefferson Chapter records was given to the Library by the President of the Chapter, Harvey J. Hague of Charlottesville, Virginia, through the auspices of Thomas Mason, Papers of James Madison, on March 24, 1987.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These records concerning the activities and business of the local Thomas Jefferson Chapter of the Sons of the American Revolutionconsist of ca. seventy-five items, 1985-1986, and were originally received by this department in a three-ring binder. The collection contains minutes of meetings, agendas, reports, membership lists, treasurer's reports, and prospective members lists.
